articles.title: Singaporean rapper Shigga Shay sells out 999 NFTs from debut Spacebars collection in 4 minutes - Channel NewsAsia
articles.description: Based on the cover of his 365 EP released in 2020, the animated artworks feature a cartoon iteration of the rapper as an astronaut. The accompanying soundtrack includes a rap he wrote specially for the collection.
articles.content:
Singaporean rapper Shigga Shays debut non-fungible token (NFT) collection, Spacebars, sold out in four minutes. All 999 artworks were snapped up upon its release on Wed (April 13).
